= Overview =

The Documentation is separated into the following sub categories according to your background and goals with Pynopticon.

* For Beginners - Tutorial on using the GUI to build a quick object recognition pipeline.

Make sure you have Pynopticon and Orange installed correctly and linked the two together (read the [Installation] page). For the theoretical background on what each step in the pipeline does read the [Overview] page.
 


* For Advanced Users - Examples on how to use Pynopticon without a GUI.

* For Developers - Documentation and a tutorial on how to create your own widgets.#summary One-sentence summary of this page.
